articles.title: NVIDIA’s Laptop Chips, After a Long-Awaited Build-Up, Are Set to Debut This Year By Q2; N1/N1X SoCs to Challenge x86 Supremacy - Wccftech
articles.description: NVIDIA plans to release ARM-based laptop chips as soon as this year, featuring the N1/N1X variants that are expected to dominate.
articles.content:
NVIDIA plans to release ARM-based laptop chips for the consumer market as soon as this year, featuring the N1/N1X variants, which are expected to dominate the WoA (Windows on ARM) platform.

articles.content:

The US has fewer but more "tech dense" farms according to a government report

articles.title: Samsung Raises Panther Lake-Equipped Galaxy Book 6 Pro’s Price By Nearly $477 Over The Previous-Gen Model - Wccftech
articles.description: Samsung has increased the prices of its new generation Galaxy Book 6 Pro laptops by a whopping 25% vs the previous generation.
articles.content:
It's clear that Samsung wants higher profits due to higher DRAM costs, but a nearly $500 price hike is just too much.
